name: ECONOMASE™
description: Economase™ is a proprietary blend of ingredients that maximizes and maintains the antioxidant status of the animal. Researchers at the Alltech® Center for Animal Nutrigenomics and Applied Animal Nutrition found that feeding certain antioxidants in conjunction with lower vitamin E levels optimizes feed conversion in animals. Economase offers a new opportunity to maximize animal performance, manage costs and protect your profitability.
